general.text: "I take no responsibility for dickheads crashing you in an open lobby..." -  *Steve Worrell*

cooldownResponses.text: Okay, that's three times... I think you might be the problem...?

addrResponses.text: Another one! One of us! One of Us! One of Us!
I'm not sure what ADDR is, but I'm pretty sure it's not a thing.
I do believe it's spelt ADRR
